title: Amazon title generation
original_prompt: Write an Amazon Listing title of 150-200 characters for the product {product:power bank} with the brand name {Brand:anker},with high-relevance core words arranged within the first 74 characters and high-relevance medium words arranged within the first 120 characters. Other product keywords should be arranged reasonably based on the product's features Note: The title should be easy to understand and ensure readability. Try to avoid special characters in the title. If necessary, use "," "-", and "&". Every first letter of the title must be capitalized, except for conjunctions, articles, prepositions, and other special words. Use Arabic numerals instead of words for any numbers in the title Do not include any other brand names or infringing information in the title, except for the brand of the product. Do not include any promotional information in the title.
input1: Anker Power Bank 20000mAh Portable Charger, Fast Charging, Dual USB Output, Compact Design for Travel, Compatible with iPhone, Samsung, and More
input2: Anker Power Bank 10000mAh Slim Portable Charger, Quick Charge Technology, Lightweight Design, Ideal for Smartphones, Tablets, and Other Devices
input1_ans: Anker Power Bank 20000mAh Portable Charger, Fast Charging Dual USB Output, Compact Design for Travel, Compatible with iPhone, Samsung, Android Devices & More

Here are some optimized title suggestions based on the provided product description:

1. "Anker Power Bank 20000mAh Portable Charger - Fast Charging Dual USB Output for iPhone & Samsung"
2. "High Capacity Anker Power Bank 20000mAh - Compact Design Portable Charger with Fast Charging"
3. "Anker 20000mAh Power Bank - Lightweight Portable Charger with Dual USB Output for Travel"
4. "Fast Charging Anker Power Bank 20000mAh - Compact Portable Charger with Multiple Ports"
5. "Anker 20000mAh Portable Charger - Dual USB Output, Compact Design, Compatible with iPhone & Samsung"

Feel free to choose any of these titles or mix and match elements to create your own!
input2_ans: Anker Power Bank 10000mAh Slim Portable Charger, Quick Charge Technology, Lightweight Design, Ideal for Smartphones, Tablets, Travel, and Other Devices

Based on the provided description, here’s a structured breakdown using the elements from the prompt:

**Product Type:**  
- Power Bank

**Brand Name:**  
- Anker

**High Relevance Core Words:**  
- Power Bank  
- Portable Charger  
- Fast Charging  

**High Relevance Medium Words:**  
- USB-C  
- High Capacity  
- Compact Design  

**Additional Features:**  
- LED Indicator  
- Multiple Ports  
- Lightweight  

**Title Structure Suggestions:**  
1. "High Capacity Portable Charger Anker Power Bank 10000mAh Quick Charge Technology"  
2. "Lightweight Design with Quick Charge Technology Ideal for Smartphones and Tablets"  

This structure highlights the key features and benefits of the Anker Power Bank while maintaining relevance to the target audience.
